events.name: Edvantage Yappon 2013
events.about: YAPPON is Indias largest coding hackathon organised by Edukinect and Microsoft for the aspiring Indian youth. We are inviting developers across India from Engineering colleges, leading industry partners on a platform to collaborate. Dream an idea, learn with us, build apps and be ready to launch your career with YAPPON. For more details please visit us at www.yappon.in
